title: The Arrangement 15: The Ferro Family
description: THE SERIES WITH OVER A MILLION COPIES SOLDVolume 15 in the New York Times Bestselling Arrangement SerialsIt's hard to trust anyone anymore. Everyone is suspect. And I have no reprieve, no rest. I can't sleep after all I've been through.Sean is slipping away, receding back into the monster he was. Alone, I'm being smothered by death's cold shroud. Too many people have died -- this ends tonight. If it kills me, so be it.Genre: New Adult RomanceThis story unfolds over multiple volumes approx. 125 pages each.~The Arrangement Vol 1-15 are on sale now.~
author: H.M. Ward
